Text: Aghh...!

He was likely the only one currently on watch duty.
During my investigation, they always kept a single-
guard rotation.

Which means...this is likely not a very important
facility for the Cult.
Why do you think that? Because of the puny guard?

Certainly, but the main reason is that we even
discovered someone was guarding this place.

In other words, if the facility was truly significant,
they wouldn't need it so obviously guarded.

Yes—such is the Cult's nature. That said, there's no
doubt this is the hidden location.

And the possessed are being transported here as
we speak. I believe this calls for...a diversion.

A diversion? Like a decoy mission?! Why? We can just
hunt 'em all down and get it over with!

If this were a regular extermination, then you'd be
absolutely right, Delta. But this time, we need to
rescue the possessed.

Do you remember how one of the Cult's researchers
administered a drug to the possessed after being
cornered in a previous rescue mission?

Unfortunately, the Shadow Garden still doesn't have
the means to subdue a possessed who's undergone
a magical overload.

I see! So we'll lure 'em out and save the possessed
while they're distracted! I can do lots more hunting
if we lure 'em out! Fun!
Delta...and Beta, you two will handle the diversion.
Me?!

You just need to support Delta—reel her in if she
gets carried away.

Besides, if anyone's going to take out Delta's
leftovers with precision, it's you, isn't it?
Hmph! I don't leave leftovers.

Anyway, understood. Delta and I will create
a diversion.

Once you two lure the enemy out, Epsilon and I
will sneak into the facility and prioritize rescuing
the possessed.
Shadow Garden...commence operation!
We're under attack!
Where did they come from?!
Oh-woof... Time to hunt!
Delta, try not to destroy the facility itself.

I know, I know! Gotta use my head when fighting
to save the possessed!
Hyaaaah!
Gyaaaahh!
D-Damn it! Call for backup!
Oh, in that case...
Beta! Why'd you let 'em go?!

Well, because that kind Cultist is about to bring us
even more prey, of course.

Oh-woof! In that case, good on you for holding out,
and good on him for fetching his friends!

I thought you didn't like hunting, Beta.
You're pretty good at it!

To be honest, I still don't really like it—
But if it's for Master Shadow...!
Looks like they were being kept in those cages.

So many empty cages! Have they been transporting them
here for a while?

If only we'd investigated sooner, we may have been
able to rescue more of them—
Epsilon!

Master Shadow gave us all manners of power and
wisdom, but that doesn't make us all-seeing gods.

We can only do our best today for the sake of
tomorrow.

We'll face many more situations like this, but we
mustn't act impulsively. All right?
Lady Alpha...

Our best today for the sake of tomorrow...
Understood!

Then, should we launch our attack? Looks like Delta
and Beta lured away most of the Cult members.
Yes. I'll follow your lead.
*yawn*...
Now!
Right behind you!
What?! Where did you—
